sharedAssessmentHelpCard.message:
Here you can share your assessments with your colleagues, such as tutors.
Find out which e-mail your colleague uses in Google Classroom. Type the e-mail below and then click the add button. Sharing assessments means that your colleague will have full read access to your assessments provided that the teacher also has the same student in any of his/her classrooms. Your colleague will see your assessments in their student progress view.

newTeacherCourseProgressHint.message: It is now possible to see the progression for a student in other courses besides the classroom you currently are working in. To see the progression of one student in other courses (with the exception of your own of course) your colleagues need to actively share these assessments with you. In the same way, you can also share your assessments with your colleagues. Select the action menu (three dot button) at top right and select "Share assessments with colleagues".
